text: The Royal Family Order of the Crown of Brunei () is an order of Brunei. It was established on 15 August 1982 by Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah. The order carries the post-nominal letters "DKMB". == References == Category:Orders, decorations, and medals of Brunei Category:Awards established in 1982 Category:1982 establishments in Brunei
title: Royal Family Order of the Crown of Brunei
